info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 10:40AM EDT until May 16 at 6:54PM EDT by NWS Wakefield VA
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Virginia...
James River At Richmond Westham affecting Chesterfield, Henrico and City of Richmond Counties.
Rivanna River At Palmyra affecting Fluvanna County.
For the Lower James Basin...including Richmond Locks, Richmond Westham, Cartersville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the James River...including Palmyra...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...James River at Richmond Westham.
* WHEN...From this evening to Friday evening.
* IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, portions of Riverside Drive begin to flood.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 5.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 14.8 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.0 feet on 02/02/2013. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued this evening at 1045 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO FRIDAY EVENING

area.areaDesc: Chesterfield, VA; Henrico, VA; City of Richmond, VA
